entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
